00032 Extruder::Extruder()
00033 {
00034   direction.resize(3,Array_base::NOCOPY_NOINIT);
00035 }

00037 // Precondition:
00038 // Parametre: Sortie& os
00039 // Signification: un flot de sortie
00040 // Valeurs par defaut:
00041 // Contraintes:
00042 // Acces: entree/sortie
00043 // Exception:
00044 // Effets de bord:
00045 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet

00077 // Precondition: on doit etre en 2D (dimension d'espace=2)
00078 // Parametre: Entree& is
00079 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00080 // Valeurs par defaut:
00081 // Contraintes:
00082 // Acces: entree/sortie
00083 // Exception: l'objet a mailler n'est pas du type Domaine
00084 // Effets de bord:
00085 // Postcondition:
00086 //
00087 //
00088 //
00089 //
00090 //
00091 //
00092 //
00093 //! Fonction principale de l'interprete Extruder<br>Triangule 1 a 1 toutes les zones du domaine<br>specifie par la directive.<br>On triangule la zone grace a la methode:<br>void Extruder::extruder(Zone\& zone) const<br>Extruder signifie ici transformer en triangle des<br>elements geometrique d'une zone.
00094 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00095 Signification: le flot d'entree<br>
00096 Contraintes: */
00097 Entree& Extruder::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00098 {
00099   Nom nom_dom;
00100   Param param(que_suis_je());
00101   param.ajouter("domaine",&nom_dom,Param::REQUIRED);
00102   param.ajouter("nb_tranches",&NZ,Param::REQUIRED);
00103   param.ajouter_arr_size_predefinie("direction",&direction,Param::REQUIRED);
00104   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00105   associer_domaine(nom_dom);
00106   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domaine());
00107   extruder(domaine());
00108   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domaine());
00109   return is;
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline void check_boundary_name(const Nom& name)
00113 {
00114 // On verifie que le bord ne se nomme pas deja devant ou derriere
00115   if (name=="devant" || name=="derriere")
00116     {
00117       Cerr << "Problem : you must change the name of the boundary  : " <<name<<finl;
00118       Cerr << "because the extrusion keyword is going to create new boundaries named derriere and devant" << finl;
00119       Cerr << "which will create a conflict." << finl;
00120       Process::exit();
00121     }
00122 }
00123 // Precondition:
00124 // Parametre: Zone& zone
00125 // Signification: la zone dont on veut raffiner les elements
00126 // Valeurs par defaut:
00127 // Contraintes:
00128 // Acces: entree/sortie
00129 // 
00130 // Signification:
00131 // Contraintes:
00132 // Exception:
00133 // Effets de bord:
00134 // Postcondition: la methode ne modifie pas l'objet
00135 //
00136 //
00137 //
00138 //
00139 //! Triangule tous les element d'une zone: transforme<br>les elements goemetriques de la zone en triangles.<br>Pour l'instant on ne sait raffiner que des Rectangles<br>(on les coupe en 4).
00140 void Extruder::extruder(Domaine& dom)
00141 {
00142   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00143 
00144   if((zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Rectangle" || zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() ==  "Quadrangle" ))
00145     {
00146       extruder_hexa(dom);
00147     }
00148   else if( zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() == "Triangle")
00149     {
00150       int oldnbsom = zone.nb_som();
00151       IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00152       int oldsz=les_elems.dimension(0);
00153       double dx = direction(0)/NZ;
00154       double dy = direction(1)/NZ;
00155       double dz = direction(2)/NZ;
00156 
00157       Faces les_faces;
00158 // zone.creer_faces(les_faces);
00159       {
00160 // bloc a factoriser avec Zone_VF.cpp :
00161         Type_Face type_face = zone.type_elem().type_face(0);
00162         les_faces.typer(type_face);
00163         les_faces.associer_zone(zone);
00164 
00165         Static_Int_Lists connectivite_som_elem;
00166         const int     nb_sommets_tot = zone.domaine().nb_som_tot();
00167         const IntTab&    elements       = zone.les_elems();
00168 
00169         construire_connectivite_som_elem(nb_sommets_tot,
00170                                          elements,
00171                                          connectivite_som_elem,
00172                                          1 /* include virtual elements */);
00173 
00174         Faces_builder faces_builder;
00175         IntTab elem_faces; //!< Tableau dont on aura pas besoin
00176         faces_builder.creer_faces_reeles(zone,
00177                                          connectivite_som_elem,
00178                                          les_faces,
00179                                          elem_faces);
00180       }
00181       const int nbfaces2D = les_faces.nb_faces();
00182 
00183 
00184       int newnbsom = oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+nbfaces2D*NZ;
00185       DoubleTab new_soms(newnbsom, 3);
00186       DoubleTab& coord_sommets=dom.les_sommets();
00187       Objet_U::dimension=3;
00188 
00189 
00190 // les sommets du maillage 2D sont translates en premier
00191       for (int i=0; i<oldnbsom; i++)
00192         {
00193           double x = coord_sommets(i,0);
00194           double y = coord_sommets(i,1);
00195           double z=0.;
00196           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00197             z=coord_sommets(i,2);
00198 
00199           for (int k=0; k<=NZ; k++)
00200             {
00201               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,0)=x;
00202               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,1)=y;
00203               new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,2)=z;
00204 
00205               x += dx;
00206               y += dy;
00207               z += dz;
00208             }
00209         }
00210 
00211 
00212 // puis on cree les centres de gravite des elements 2D puis translation de ces points
00213       for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00214         {
00215           int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00216           int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00217           int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00218 
00219           double xg = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0)+coord_sommets(i2,0))+0.5*dx;
00220           double yg = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1)+coord_sommets(i2,1))+0.5*dy;
00221           double z = 0.5*dz;
00222           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00223             z = 1./3.*(coord_sommets(i0,2)+coord_sommets(i1,2)+coord_sommets(i2,2))+0.5*dz;
00224           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00225             {
00226 
00227               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,0)=xg;
00228               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,1)=yg;
00229               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+i,2)=z;
00230 
00231               xg += dx;
00232               yg += dy;
00233               z += dz;
00234             }
00235         }
00236 
00237 
00238 // enfin, on cree les centres des faces du maillage 2D puis translation de ces points
00239       for (int i=0; i<nbfaces2D; i++)
00240         {
00241           int i0=les_faces.sommet(i,0);
00242           int i1=les_faces.sommet(i,1);
00243 
00244           double x01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0))+0.5*dx;
00245           double y01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1))+0.5*dy;
00246           double z = 0.5*dz;
00247           if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00248             z = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,2)+coord_sommets(i1,2))+0.5*dz;
00249 
00250           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00251             {
00252               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,0)=x01;
00253               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,1)=y01;
00254               new_soms(oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+i,2)=z;
00255               x01 += dx;
00256               y01 += dy;
00257               z += dz;
00258             }
00259         }
00260 
00261 
00262       coord_sommets.resize(0);
00263       dom.ajouter(new_soms);
00264 
00265       int newnbelem = 14*NZ*oldsz;
00266       IntTab new_elems(newnbelem, 4); //!< les nouveaux elements
00267       int cpt=0;
00268 
00269 
00270 // en premier, on stocke les tetra du haut et du bas : NZ*nb_triangle*2 tetra
00271       for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00272         {
00273           int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00274           int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00275           int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00276 
00277           int ig=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+i;
00278 
00279           for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00280             {
00281               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,0) = i0;
00282               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,1) = i1;
00283               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,2) = i2;
00284               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i,3) = ig;
00285               cpt++;
00286 
00287               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,0) = i0+oldnbsom;
00288               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00289               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,2) = i2+oldnbsom;
00290               new_elems(2*k*oldsz+2*i+1,3) = ig;
00291               cpt++;
00292 
00293               mettre_a_jour_sous_zone(zone,i,2*k*oldsz+2*i,2);
00294 
00295               i0+=oldnbsom;
00296               i1+=oldnbsom;
00297               i2+=oldnbsom;
00298               ig+=oldsz;
00299             }
00300         }
00301 
00302 
00303 
00304 // puis les autres tetras
00305       for (int i=0; i<nbfaces2D; i++)
00306         {
00307           for (int ivois=0; ivois<2; ivois++)
00308             {
00309               int elem = les_faces.voisin(i,ivois);
00310 
00311               if (elem>=0)
00312                 {
00313                   int i0=les_faces.sommet(i,0);
00314                   int i1=les_faces.sommet(i,1);
00315                   int i01=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+i;
00316 
00317                   for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00318                     {
00319                       int ig=oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+k*oldsz+elem;
00320 
00321                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0;
00322                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1;
00323                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00324                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00325 
00326                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0+oldnbsom;
00327                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00328                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00329                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00330 
00331                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i1;
00332                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i1+oldnbsom;
00333                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00334                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00335 
00336                       new_elems(cpt,0) = i0;
00337                       new_elems(cpt,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00338                       new_elems(cpt,2) = i01;
00339                       new_elems(cpt++,3) = ig;
00340 
00341 
00342                       i0+=oldnbsom;
00343                       i1+=oldnbsom;
00344                       i01+=nbfaces2D;
00345                       ig+=oldsz;
00346                     }
00347                 }
00348             }
00349         }
00350 
00351       les_elems.ref(new_elems);
00352 
00353 // Reconstruction de l'octree
00354       zone.invalide_octree();
00355       zone.typer("Tetraedre");
00356 
00357       extruder_dvt(dom, les_faces,oldnbsom, oldsz);
00358 
00359     }
00360   else
00361     {
00362       Cerr << "It is not known yet how to extrude "
00363            << zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je() <<"s"<<finl;
00364       exit();
00365     }
00366 }

00369 
00370 void Extruder::traiter_faces_dvt(Faces& les_faces_bord, Faces& les_faces, int oldnbsom, int oldsz, int nbfaces2D )
00371 {
00372   int size_2D = les_faces_bord.nb_faces();
00373 
00374   IntTab les_sommets(4*size_2D*NZ, 3);
00375 
00376   for (int i=0; i<size_2D; i++)
00377     {
00378       int i0=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,0);
00379       int i1=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,1);
00380 
00381 // double x01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,0)+coord_sommets(i1,0));
00382 // double y01 = 0.5*(coord_sommets(i0,1)+coord_sommets(i1,1));
00383 
00384 // on recherche le numero de cette face de bord: pas top!
00385       int jface=-1;
00386       for (int iface=0; iface<nbfaces2D; iface++)
00387         {
00388           int j0=les_faces.sommet(iface,0);
00389           int j1=les_faces.sommet(iface,1);
00390 
00391           if (((i0==j0) &&(i1==j1)) || ((i0==j1) &&(i1==j0)))
00392             {
00393               jface=iface;
00394               break;
00395             }
00396         }
00397       assert(jface>=0);
00398 
00399       for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00400         {
00401 // double z = (k+0.5)*dz;
00402 // int i01 = zone.chercher_sommets(x01, y01, z);
00403           int j01 = oldnbsom*(NZ+1)+NZ*oldsz+k*nbfaces2D+jface;
00404 
00405           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i,0) = i0;
00406           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i,1) = i1;
00407           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i,2) = j01;
00408 
00409           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+1,0) = j01;
00410           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+1,1) = i1;
00411           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+1,2) = i1+oldnbsom;
00412 
00413 
00414           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+2,0) = j01;
00415           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+2,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00416           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+2,2) = i1+oldnbsom;
00417 
00418 
00419           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+3,0) = j01;
00420           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+3,1) = i0+oldnbsom;
00421           les_sommets(k*4*size_2D+4*i+3,2) = i0;
00422 
00423           i0+=oldnbsom;
00424           i1+=oldnbsom;
00425         }
00426     }
00427 
00428   les_faces_bord.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00429   les_faces_bord.les_sommets().ref(les_sommets);
00430   les_faces_bord.voisins().resize(4*size_2D*NZ, 2);
00431   les_faces_bord.voisins()=-1;
00432 }
00433 
00434 
00435 
00436 void Extruder::extruder_dvt(Domaine& dom, Faces& les_faces, int oldnbsom, int oldsz)
00437 {
00438   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00439   const int nbfaces2D = les_faces.nb_faces();
00440   IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00441   {
00442     LIST_CURSEUR(Bord) curseur(zone.faces_bord());
00443     while(curseur)
00444       {
00445         check_boundary_name(curseur->le_nom());
00446         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur->faces();
00447         traiter_faces_dvt(les_faces_bord, les_faces, oldnbsom, oldsz, nbfaces2D );
00448         ++curseur;
00449       }
00450   }
00451   {
00452     LIST_CURSEUR(Raccord) curseur(zone.faces_raccord());
00453     while(curseur)
00454       {
00455         check_boundary_name(curseur->le_nom());
00456         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur.valeur()->faces();
00457         traiter_faces_dvt(les_faces_bord, les_faces, oldnbsom, oldsz, nbfaces2D );
00458         ++curseur;
00459       }
00460   }
00461 
00462   Bord& devant = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00463   devant.nommer("devant");
00464   Faces& les_faces_dvt=devant.faces();
00465   les_faces_dvt.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00466 
00467   IntTab som_dvt(oldsz, 3);
00468   les_faces_dvt.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00469   les_faces_dvt.voisins()=-1;
00470 
00471   Bord& derriere = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00472   derriere.nommer("derriere");
00473   Faces& les_faces_der=derriere.faces();
00474   les_faces_der.typer(Faces::triangle_3D);
00475 
00476   IntTab som_der(oldsz, 3);
00477   les_faces_der.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00478   les_faces_der.voisins()=-1;
00479 
00480   for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00481     {
00482       int i0=les_elems(2*i,0);
00483       int i1=les_elems(2*i,1);
00484       int i2=les_elems(2*i,2);
00485 
00486       som_dvt(i,0) = i0;
00487       som_dvt(i,1) = i1;
00488       som_dvt(i,2) = i2;
00489 
00490       som_der(i,0) = i0+oldnbsom*NZ;
00491       som_der(i,1) = i1+oldnbsom*NZ;
00492       som_der(i,2) = i2+oldnbsom*NZ;
00493 
00494     }
00495 
00496 
00497   les_faces_dvt.les_sommets().ref(som_dvt);
00498   les_faces_der.les_sommets().ref(som_der);
00499 
00500 }
00501 
00502 void Extruder::extruder_hexa(Domaine& dom)
00503 {
00504   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00505   int oldnbsom = zone.nb_som();
00506   IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00507   int oldsz=les_elems.dimension(0);
00508   double dx = direction(0)/NZ;
00509   double dy = direction(1)/NZ;
00510   double dz = direction(2)/NZ;
00511 
00512   Faces les_faces;
00513   {
00514 // bloc a factoriser avec Zone_VF.cpp :
00515     Type_Face type_face = zone.type_elem().type_face(0);
00516     les_faces.typer(type_face);
00517     les_faces.associer_zone(zone);
00518 
00519     Static_Int_Lists connectivite_som_elem;
00520     const int     nb_sommets_tot = zone.domaine().nb_som_tot();
00521     const IntTab&    elements       = zone.les_elems();
00522 
00523     construire_connectivite_som_elem(nb_sommets_tot,
00524                                      elements,
00525                                      connectivite_som_elem,
00526                                      1 /* include virtual elements */);
00527 
00528     Faces_builder faces_builder;
00529     IntTab elem_faces; //!< Tableau dont on aura pas besoin
00530     faces_builder.creer_faces_reeles(zone,
00531                                      connectivite_som_elem,
00532                                      les_faces,
00533                                      elem_faces);
00534   }
00535 
00536   int newnbsom = oldnbsom*(NZ+1);
00537   DoubleTab new_soms(newnbsom, 3);
00538   DoubleTab& coord_sommets=dom.les_sommets();
00539   Objet_U::dimension=3;
00540 
00541   int i;
00542 // les sommets du maillage 2D sont translates
00543   for (i=0; i<oldnbsom; i++)
00544     {
00545       double x = coord_sommets(i,0);
00546       double y = coord_sommets(i,1);
00547       double z=0.;
00548       if (coord_sommets.dimension(1)>2)
00549         z=coord_sommets(i,2);
00550       for (int k=0; k<=NZ; k++)
00551         {
00552           new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,0)=x;
00553           new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,1)=y;
00554           new_soms(k*oldnbsom+i,2)=z;
00555 
00556           x += dx;
00557           y += dy;
00558           z += dz;
00559         }
00560     }
00561 
00562 
00563   coord_sommets.resize(0);
00564   dom.ajouter(new_soms);
00565 
00566   int newnbelem = NZ*oldsz;
00567   IntTab new_elems(newnbelem, 8); //!< les nouveaux elements
00568 
00569 
00570 // definition des nouveaux hexas
00571   for (i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00572     {
00573       int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00574       int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00575       int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00576       int i3=les_elems(i,3);
00577 
00578 
00579       for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00580         {
00581           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,0) = i0;
00582           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,1) = i1;
00583           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,2) = i2;
00584           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,3) = i3;
00585           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,4) = i0+oldnbsom;
00586           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,5) = i1+oldnbsom;
00587           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,6) = i2+oldnbsom;
00588           new_elems(k*oldsz+i,7) = i3+oldnbsom;
00589 
00590 
00591           i0+=oldnbsom;
00592           i1+=oldnbsom;
00593           i2+=oldnbsom;
00594           i3+=oldnbsom;
00595         }
00596     }
00597 
00598   les_elems.ref(new_elems);
00599 
00600 // Reconstruction de l'octree
00601   zone.invalide_octree();
00602   if ((zone.type_elem()->que_suis_je()) ==  "Quadrangle")
00603     zone.typer("Hexaedre_VEF");
00604   else
00605     zone.typer("Hexaedre");
00606 
00607   extruder_dvt_hexa(dom, les_faces,oldnbsom, oldsz);
00608 }
00609 
00610 void Extruder::traiter_faces_dvt_hexa(Faces& les_faces_bord, int oldnbsom)
00611 {
00612   int size_2D = les_faces_bord.nb_faces();
00613 
00614   IntTab les_sommets(size_2D*NZ, 4);
00615 
00616   for (int i=0; i<size_2D; i++)
00617     {
00618       int i0=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,0);
00619       int i1=les_faces_bord.sommet(i,1);
00620 
00621 
00622       for (int k=0; k<NZ; k++)
00623         {
00624           les_sommets(k*size_2D+i,0) = i0;
00625           les_sommets(k*size_2D+i,1) = i1;
00626           les_sommets(k*size_2D+i,2) = i0+oldnbsom;
00627           les_sommets(k*size_2D+i,3) = i1+oldnbsom;
00628 
00629           i0+=oldnbsom;
00630           i1+=oldnbsom;
00631         }
00632     }
00633 
00634   les_faces_bord.typer(Faces::quadrangle_3D);
00635   les_faces_bord.les_sommets().ref(les_sommets);
00636   les_faces_bord.voisins().resize(size_2D*NZ, 2);
00637   les_faces_bord.voisins()=-1;
00638 }
00639 
00640 void Extruder::extruder_dvt_hexa(Domaine& dom, Faces& les_faces, int oldnbsom, int oldsz)
00641 {
00642   Zone& zone = dom.zone(0);
00643   IntTab& les_elems=zone.les_elems();
00644   {
00645     LIST_CURSEUR(Bord) curseur(zone.faces_bord());
00646     while(curseur)
00647       {
00648         check_boundary_name(curseur->le_nom());
00649         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur->faces();
00650         traiter_faces_dvt_hexa(les_faces_bord, oldnbsom);
00651         ++curseur;
00652       }
00653   }
00654   {
00655     LIST_CURSEUR(Raccord) curseur(zone.faces_raccord());
00656     while(curseur)
00657       {
00658         check_boundary_name(curseur->le_nom());
00659         Faces& les_faces_bord=curseur.valeur()->faces();
00660         traiter_faces_dvt_hexa(les_faces_bord, oldnbsom);
00661         ++curseur;
00662       }
00663   }
00664 
00665   Bord& devant = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00666   devant.nommer("devant");
00667   Faces& les_faces_dvt=devant.faces();
00668   les_faces_dvt.typer(Faces::quadrangle_3D);
00669 
00670   IntTab som_dvt(oldsz, 4);
00671   les_faces_dvt.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00672   les_faces_dvt.voisins()=-1;
00673 
00674   Bord& derriere = zone.faces_bord().add(Bord());
00675   derriere.nommer("derriere");
00676   Faces& les_faces_der=derriere.faces();
00677   les_faces_der.typer(Faces::quadrangle_3D);
00678 
00679   IntTab som_der(oldsz, 4);
00680   les_faces_der.voisins().resize(oldsz, 2);
00681   les_faces_der.voisins()=-1;
00682 
00683   for (int i=0; i<oldsz; i++)
00684     {
00685       int i0=les_elems(i,0);
00686       int i1=les_elems(i,1);
00687       int i2=les_elems(i,2);
00688       int i3=les_elems(i,3);
00689 
00690       som_dvt(i,0) = i0;
00691       som_dvt(i,1) = i1;
00692       som_dvt(i,2) = i2;
00693       som_dvt(i,3) = i3;
00694 
00695       som_der(i,0) = i0+oldnbsom*NZ;
00696       som_der(i,1) = i1+oldnbsom*NZ;
00697       som_der(i,2) = i2+oldnbsom*NZ;
00698       som_der(i,3) = i3+oldnbsom*NZ;
00699 
00700     }
00701 
00702 
00703   les_faces_dvt.les_sommets().ref(som_dvt);
00704   les_faces_der.les_sommets().ref(som_der);
00705 
00706 }
